Articles.Content:
I've been having issues with launching KSP for a while. I've been using Opengl, for dat framerate, but it caused a couple problems. Launching the game caused some visual bugs, and I couldn't get into the settings window. Those are known bugs. I'm sure they'd fix themselves if I turned Opengl off. I'm not sure how to do that, which is one problem.

The new problem is that the game won't run at all now. I launch it, the process starts, but nothing happens. My computer says it's running, but it just ain't there. Anyone have a fix for this?

This forum is for Gameplay question.

Example: "How do I launch a rocket?"

Technical questions will probably receive a better response in one of the support forums.

Sorry, forgot

How does one delete a thread?
Ask a moderator to move it for you.

Or wait till one passes and flag him down

Moved thread, our problem is probably the openGL switch, don't use it and see if it works, if not then post your logs
Alternatively, if you want to use OpenGL, you need to have the -popupwindow option present as well; OpenGL doesn't work with standard fullscreen mode right now :/
